OOC: Nostra Damus warned everyone of this, he did. He said that this would =
happen. I think this is as bad as much as everyone else does, I'm just sayi=
ng that the greatest psychic of all time, Nostra Damus, many many years ago=
 before his death warned us all of the evil Saudi Arabia and exactly what t=
hey were going to do. He said they would attack the "New" city and it would=
 be terror from the sky. He said it would be Saudi Arabia, and it would be =
a blue turbaned man with radical worshippers, and that they would start the=
 3rd world war. Let's hope for the best...

  ----- Original Message ----- =

  From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: =
Tuesday, September 11, 2001 6:04 PM
  Subject: Re: Terrorist bombs-Everyone=
 read


  OOC:  Well, I'm not as affected, as I'm Canadian(I am, you know I=
 am!)  but, there has still been much word here in Canada, and we are shutt=
ing down stuff too for the safety of anybody who those assholes might want =
to attack.  Hey, can anybody say Saddam  Hussain(sp?)?
    ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
    From: aerosmith60@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

    Sent: Tuesday, September 11, 2001 2:14 PM
    Subject: Terrorist bombs=
-Everyone read


    I am sad and disqusted with what has transpired this d=
ay. I am in sheer 
    shock of what has happened. The idea that some dumb =
fucks felt that they need 
    to kill innocent lives to prove thier point =
are beyond me. I wish I had one 
    chance to meet the bastards responsibl=
e for this and....but thats not 
    important. I wish to send out my hopes=
 that no one in the rpg was hurt or 
    killed in this attack. I pray for =
all the victims and thier familes and 
    friends.
